trans-unit.source: An instance of StateChangedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: En instans av StateChangedEventArgs skapas när den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objekt aktiverar den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged>händelse.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the values for the new and the previous <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Att hämta värden för den nya och den tidigare <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>, åtkomst till den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A>och <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState>Egenskaper i hanteraren för händelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> before the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> innan den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The PreviousState property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen PreviousState representerar tillståndet synthesizer med en medlem i den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: Returns the state of the synthesizer before the state changed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar tillståndet för synthesizern innan tillståndet ändras.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"></xref> before the <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer"> </xref> innan den <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The State property represents the synthesizer state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen State representerar tillståndet synthesizer med en medlem i den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>uppräkningen.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the synthesizer after the state changed.
trans-unit.target: Status för synthesizer när tillståndet ändras.
